comments.author: rat03gopoh
comments.body: Profits of this kind aren't guaranteed if you rely on volatility, but it can give you more just by holding on. comments.author: gunhell16
comments.body: Quote from: Heyui67 on April 20, 2023, 03:44:19 PMWhere can I invest 4k bitcoinTo make profit daily 100$Any suggestions inside crypto or any other field Well in my experience, when I do trading in one day I get a profit from 8$ on 100$ capital. To be honest, there is no such thing as a fixed amount of income here in crypto trading.

comments.author: Ale88
comments.body: Quote from: Heyui67 on April 20, 2023, 03:44:19 PMWhere can I invest 4k bitcoinTo make profit daily 100$Any suggestions inside crypto or any other field I'd suggest you to contact Bernie Madoff's office, probably he's the only one in the world that is able to offer you that kind of returns. comments.author: palle11
comments.body: Is that 4,000 bitcoin or 4,000 dollar worth of bitcoin? Well whatever value of bitcoin it is, my advise to you is to hodl your worth of bitcoin because you are seeking a specified amount of profit and that is not certain in crypto trading. The certain phenomenon in crypto is that it value fluctuate and that is also how your profit margin can fluctuate and not remain stagnant. Or you can convert your bitcoin to fiat and loan it out on a particular fixed interest by the month end.

comments.author: Faisal2202
comments.body: Quote from: Heyui67 on April 20, 2023, 03:44:19 PMWhere can I invest 4k bitcoinTo make profit daily 100$Any suggestions inside crypto or any other field You have such a big amount of BTC, you should hold them for a longer period of time, but as your question is reflecting, you could be in need of money, I think you should start from spot trading (day trading). But as your account is new, i don't know how much experience you have in trading but I think you should get familiar with trading fundamentals so that you could achieve your daily target. It's not fixed either in daily trading to book 100$ in only BTC because for that you need years of experience. In order to earn 100$ daily you need to diversify your money so that if one goes down then you could make a profit from another and in this way, you can achieve the target of $100. But still, the market is so unpredictable to make $100 dollars every day. Take an example of the recent down of BTC on 19th April, almost $260 million dollars were liquidated in only 1-hour candle when BTC drops only $1000 dollars. Even though i have seen no news that could cause this trend, instead, all it was doing is unexpected correction still BTC is bleeding but just for the short term, in the long run, their are high chances of BTC to reach around $40k in May.

comments.author: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
comments.body: $4k in Bitcoin now is about 0.142 bitcoin, of which if you hold that bitcoin till the price gets to at least $65k, you would make a 131% interest on your holding, which is an addition of about $5,230. but $100 per day x 365 days is about $36,500, which is very significant, but I'd suggest that holding is less risky than risking your bitcoin unto investing into any platform. You are not good at trading; if you were, that would have been beneficial to you in taking advantage of price volatility, but since you are unskilled about it, it would be a bad idea.

comments.author: sheenshane
comments.body: Quote from: Heyui67 on April 20, 2023, 03:44:19 PMWhere can I invest 4k bitcoinTo make profit daily 100$Any suggestions inside crypto or any other field If there is, most of the people now here have been rich. Understand the word "investment", there's no investment is guaranteed to provide a daily profit of a specific amount, as the market can be unpredictable.  Even gambling that has the potential to double or easily wipe out your Bitcoin which is not ideal advice, that's very risky. Just hold your Bitcoin in a long term and never think about the daily profit.

comments.author: Myleschetty
comments.body: Quote from: Heyui67 on April 20, 2023, 03:44:19 PMWhere can I invest 4k bitcoinTo make profit daily 100$Any suggestions inside crypto or any other fieldBitcoin is not a pot of gold or quick to a rich scheme. I will advise you to ignore anyone that sends you a PM about any chance of making a $100 profit or more daily.The best way to make a profit in this market is through long-term investment. comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: Quote from: Heyui67 on April 20, 2023, 03:44:19 PMWhere can I invest 4k bitcoinTo make profit daily 100$Any suggestions inside crypto or any other field $100 Daily is not something you can just achieve easily, and like others have suggested it's better you just hodl for a long time and if you're lucky enough you could make a very decent profit from it.Although, we different strategy that could help you scale up your capital and also help you earn alot of money and at the same time you'll also be risking the money and that is "Trading'.If you are very good at trading, I mean extremely good at trading then you can use part of the money to trade and earn yourself some profits but the fact that you're asking this type of question means you don't have trading knowledge whatever which means the best thing for you to do at this point will be for you to just hodl your coin and hope the price rises.

comments.author: SamReomo
comments.body: Quote from: Heyui67 on April 20, 2023, 03:44:19 PMWhere can I invest 4k bitcoinTo make profit daily 100$Any suggestions inside crypto or any other field I don't think that you can make anywhere close to $100 a day with $4k or even $8k by investing in crypto. It is however possible to make such profits sometimes but that doesn't happen everyday, and only those can earn $100 or more per day who have great knowledge about trading. From your asking style I got the idea that you aren't well aware of crypto trading so making that much is not possible for you.Like other respected members have said investing and holding for longer is a safe option for you. But, only invest in Bitcoin do not invest in any other altcoin. I would recommend you to divide your capital into 4 parts and only buy when the market is going down. Do not buy in bull market because you will end up loosing half of your capital.You can't make $100 a day from any other field not even from crypto. In crypto world there were some Dao projects that were promising huge gains but as far as my knowledge everyone who invested in such projects have lost their money. Do not fall into the trap of the influencers, their main intention is to earn from you trough AdSense and other products.

comments.author: mirakal
comments.body: Quote from: Heyui67 on April 20, 2023, 03:44:19 PMWhere can I invest 4k bitcoinTo make profit daily 100$Any suggestions inside crypto or any other field First, it's important to understand what investment means. When we say investment, it means you're willing to risk your money for a chance at a bigger return. And when we say 'risk,' that means you could either be profitable or not. So what you're looking for is not investing because it does not exist. Hopefully, you don't misunderstand investment as a Ponzi scheme that offers daily profit, which is obviously a scam.
